snippet.title: Tokyo Pinball - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Tokyo Pinball is a mini-game designed to introduce the fun of pinball to as many people as possible.

The game consists of the basic rules familiar to pinball, but to make it easier for beginners to play, an automatic slow-motion function, stamina-based nudging, and kickbacks are implemented.

Whether you have never played pinball before or not, I hope you will enjoy playing it.

▼Twitter
https://twitter.com/atsuyusky
